TemplateContent.Subject: [NACC Data Platform] Submission Pipeline Complete
TemplateContent.Text:
Dear {{first_name}},

The submission pipeline for {{file_name}} has completed running for {{center_name}}.

You can now head over to the NACC Data Platform ({{portal_url}}) to verify the results. Please note that completion of the submission pipeline does not necessarily mean it passed validation, and further action may be required.

If you have any issues, please reach out to the NACC Tech Team at nacchelp@uw.edu.
TemplateContent.Html:
Dear {{first_name}},

The submission pipeline for {{file_name}} has completed running for {{center_name}}.

You can now head over to the NACC Data Platform to verify the results. Please note that completion of the submission pipeline does not necessarily mean it passed validation, and further action may be required.

If you have any issues, please reach out to the NACC Tech Team at nacchelp@uw.edu.

NACC is funded by the National Institute on Aging (U24 AG072122) and located in the Department of Epidemiology at the University of Washington School of Public Health, Walter A. Kukull, Ph.D., Director. Â© 2025 University of Washington
